title: EP 122 Sittin Fat Down South with Lil Troy
itunes:title: EP 122 Sittin Fat Down South with Lil Troy
description:
In this episode we sit down with notorious Houston, TX rapper “Lil Troy”. We discuss his upbringing in Houston’s South Park neighborhood, How he tricked Universal into signing him despite his pending prison sentence,his love for hustling and why he believes that syrup is more valuable than powder in Texas, how he discovered Scarface and how they squashed their decades long beef and much more, you gotta press play and listen!


Make sure you follow us on Instagram, Facebook and all that or we socking you in the neck when we see you!@THEGANGSTERCHRONICLESPODCAST 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
